title: Career Q&A Part 1!
itunes:title: Career Q&A Part 1!
description:
It’s been a while since we have talked about our jobs and answered your career questions so today… we’re doing it! We got so many questions that we split ‘em up into two episodes, so stay tuned for part 2!

 

Today we have a mix of personal questions about our careers and some of your more meaty, specific scenarios. We dig into the different ways we have built up our audience and client base, vetting clients and determining your worth. We talk about our 5-10 year plan (more like, lack thereof!), grad school, imposter syndrome, how to effectively network and how our political beliefs have affected the podcast and our jobs. We really loved all of your specific work questions, and we give advice to folks who have been encountering challenges with job titles, managing people, asking for more money (what is your spaghetti number?), and being pigeonholed into a role you dislike. Please send us more of these questions, we love them!

 

Obsessions:

  • Parachute Linen Bedding
  • West Elm Wine Glasses

Instagram:

  • @stay_snatched
  • @saralyon9 and @sovehome

We’re Reading:

  • Follow Me by Cathleen Barber
  • When No One is Watching by Alyssa Cole
  • Kings County by David Goodwillie

September Book Club:

  • Majesty (American Royals Book 2) by Katharine McGee

Sponsor:

  • Bon Viv:  Try them and take a photo of your favorite flavor and tag us on instagram!
  • Night: Go to discovernight.com and get 20% off with code BOP20 at checkout.

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more!

Like and subscribe to RomComPods. Available wherever you listen to podcasts. Visit Grace’s blog, The Stripe. New posts daily!

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast. Follow Grace on Instagram @graceatwood and Becca @beccamfreeman.
